record.title: EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS
record.narrative:
EXTENSION OF MORNING BUSINESS -- (Senate - July 14, 2008)

[Page: S6619]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the morning hour be extended to 4:30, with all other conditions of the previous order remaining in effect.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
The Senator from Virginia is recognized.
